name: Timmy
action: Shared lunch with a friend who forgot theirs.
details: Timmy gave half his sandwich to Sarah.

name: Tammy
action: Broke a window playing baseball and didn't tell anyone.
details: Ball went through Mrs. Gable's greenhouse. Timmy ran away.

name: Tammy
action: Fought with brother over video games.

name: Sarah
action: Planted trees with the community group.

name: Sarah
details: Said room was clean but hid mess under bed.
